sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change field values of advanced, prediction fields, pre-processing extension point, and post-processing extension point for ITSM IAR configuration</description>
        <name>Set ITSM IAR config default values</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[setDefaultValues();

function setDefaultValues() {
    var configGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
    configGr.addQuery(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIGURATION_TABLENAME_FIELD_NAME, AutoResolutionConstants.INCIDENT_TABLE_NAME);
    configGr.query();

	if (configGr.next()) {
		configGr.setValue('advanced','true');
		configGr.setValue(AutoResolutionConstants.IAR_PREDICTION_FIELDS_COLUMN_NAME,'short_description');
		configGr.setValue(AutoResolutionConstants.PRE_PROCESSING_EXT_POINT_FIELD_NAME,'a383f707eb39011054009861eb52281a');
		configGr.setValue(AutoResolutionConstants.POST_PROCESSING_EXT_POINT_FIELD_NAME,'87917be2ebf5011054009861eb5228a4');
		configGr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-12-01 15:18:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b8885f70f7671110a8ea9ef0e3bfd69b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set ITSM IAR config default values</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">81ddf4a03c75311068bcf327dfe37fa6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b8885f70f7671110a8ea9ef0e3bfd69b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-12-01 15:47:41</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set ITSM IAR config default values
